name: Celeste's Mathland
description:
Whitefire Games presents...

CELESTE'S MATHLAND

A math based virtual board game inspired by a school project done by my first grade daughter, which was heavily inspired by Candy Land

  • Local Multiplayer up to 4 players
  • All problems, tile colors, and of course die rolls are randomized.
  • Now includes a hard mode with simple multiplication and division!
  • All answers and factors are below 100 and above -1
  • Nothing above 20 is added or subtracted
  • If you input a wrong answer, a screenshot of the problem will be recorded and the correct answer will be given
  • HARD MODE:  All quotients are integers below 10
  • HARD MODE:  Products are maxed at 81 (9x9)
  • Fun animations and sound effects!
  • My daughter and nephew, (1st and 2nd grade respectively), love this game!
  • file location for screenshots: users/appdata/local/celestes_mathland/ss
